com.here.mobility.sdk.core.geo

Class LatLng

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.geo.LatLng
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, HasLatLng

    public final class LatLng
extends Object
implements HasLatLng, Parcelable
    Represents a location on the planet, defined as a (latitude, longitude) pair. LatLngs are immutable. The valid range for latitude is between -90 and 90 degrees (both inclusive). Longitude will always be between -180 (inclusive) and 180 (exclusive) degrees, but all functions taking a longitude normalize the value to that range.
